name: air
desc: Empty Block. Unobtainable.

name: shillings
desc: Currency. Can be traded in for Crowns or used to craft Statues.

name: earth
desc: Basic dirt block. Most common material in the game.

name: compost
desc: Fertilized earth blocks. Can be used to grow plants under sun and rain in a Purified World.

name: sandstone
desc: Basic stone material. Can be crafted into bricks, found mostly everywhere.

name: limestone
desc: Basic stone material. Can be crafted into bricks, found mostly everywhere.

name: sand
desc: Slightly uncommon block. No uses at the moment.

name: wood-rubble
desc: Scraps of broken wood. Found in ruins, can be used to craft wood.

name: stone-rubble
desc: Bits of stone. Found in ruins, can be used to craft stone.

name: flax
desc: Common dead plant. Found in every biome. Can be used to craft a variety of basic materials and blocks.

name: resin
desc: Remains of Terrapus Eggs and other organic matter. Used in a variety of applications.

name: clay
desc: Found underground in varying patches. Can be used to craft bricks and other materials.

name: salt
desc: Common underground crystal. Used to dry out organic matter into a preserved food among other applications.

name: fire-salt
desc: Rarer variety of salt. Only formed in hell biomes. Can be used to create a more powerful variation of food created with normal salt.

name: iron-ore
desc: Common metal. Used to craft a large amount of tools and materials.

name: copper-ore
desc: Common metal. Used to craft a large amount of blocks and materials.

name: zinc-ore
desc: Common ore. Used in electrical applications, and used to create alloys.

name: lead-ore
desc: Common metal. Used to craft a large amount of blocks and materials.

name: quartz-ore
desc: Common ore. Used to craft glass and other crystaline materials.

name: sulfur-ore
desc: Uncommon ore. Used to craft explosives and other materials.

name: marble-ore
desc: Common ore. Used to create building materials and mainly decorational items.

name: bloodstone-ore
desc: Uncommon ore only found in the hell biome. Mainly used to craft bloodstone variations of marble items and statues.

name: beryllium-ore
desc: Uncommon metal only found in the desert biome. Used in many technical and decorational applications.

name: diamond-ore
desc: Very rare ore only found in the ice biome. Mainly used to craft powerful tools and weapons. Can also be used to make upgraded technology.

name: blue-crystal
desc: Common crystal. Mainly used in technology and weapons. Can also be used to create decorational blocks.

name: medium-blue-crystal
desc: Common crystal. Decorational.

name: large-blue-crystal
desc: Uncommon crystal. Decorational.

name: purple-crystal
desc: Uncommon crystal. Mainly used in technology and weapons. Can also be used to create decorational blocks.

name: large-purple-crystal
desc: Uncommon crystal. Decorational.

name: red-crystal
desc: Uncommon crystal. Mainly used in technology and weapons. Can also be used to create decorational blocks.

name: large-red-crystal
desc: Rare crystal. Decorational.

name: green-crystal
desc: Uncommon crystal only found in the space biome. Mainly used in technology and weapons.

name: large-green-crystal
desc: Rare crystal only found in the space biome. Decorational.

name: white-crystal
placedSprite: Uncommon crystal only found in the space biome. Mainly used in technology and weapons.

name: large-white-crystal
desc: Rare crystal only found in the space biome. Decorational.

name: yellow-crystal
desc: Rare crystal only found in the desert biome. Decorational.

name: orange-crystal
desc: Very rare crystal only found in the deep biome. Decorational.

name: rainbow-crystal
desc: Very rare crystal found in most biomes. Decorational.

name: onyx
desc: Extremely rare gem found in most biomes. Used to create powerful weapons and tools. Also used to upgrade technology.

name: platinum-ore
desc: Rare metal. In large quanities, it is used to upgrade onyx tier items. Highest tier material in the game besides the beta tools.

name: ice
desc: Common material only found in the arctic biome. Can be used to craft a large variety of ice themed blocks and decoration.

name: snow
desc: Common material only found in the arctic biome. Can be used to craft a large variety of snow themed blocks and decoration.

name: water
desc: Common fluid. Unobtainable. Can be packed into jars.

name: acid
desc: Common fluid. Unobtainable. Can be packed into jars.

name: magma
desc: Uncommon fluid. Unobtainable.

name: wood
desc: Common material. Used in a variety of recipes and applications.

name: stone
desc: Common material. Used in a lot of recipes and applications.

name: pitch
desc: Common artificial material. Used in a lot of construction applications.
